post.title: RSS Bandit Now Supports Authenticated RSS Feeds
post.title_plain: RSS Bandit Now Supports Authenticated RSS Feeds
post.content: Dare rocks. Less than 24 hours after my request to support authenticated feeds, he’s updated RSS Bandit to support default credentials. You can either download the latest build or get the code (also need this code). That does it – I’m moving to RSS Bandit full time.
